name: Ah Teik Char Koay Teow
description: A famous stall known for its delicious char koay teow.

name: Boston Coffee
description: A cozy cafe that serves a variety of coffee and pastries.

name: Curry Mee Air Itam Market
description: A popular spot for curry mee in Air Itam Market.

name: Deens Maju Nasi Kandar
description: Popular street stand known for nasi kandar, a traditional local favorite of rice & curries..

name: Green House Prawn Mee Corner
description: For over 30 years, the regulars have been returning for its Hokkien prawn mee, loh mee, or a mix of both. The red prawn soup made with pork bones and prawn shells boasts deep umami. Twelve additional toppings are also available.

name: Hema Hema Ice Cream
description: An artisanal ice cream shop in George Town (Penang, Malaysia) that opened in 2022. Since its opening, it’s being flocked by locals and tourists alike.

name: Kopi Hutan
description: This is the highest cafe in Penang, situated at about 730 meters above sea level, offering a serene ambiance that's truly breathtaking!

name: Luodong
description: The famous cafe from Sungai Petani, now with a second branch in Georgetown. In this new location, they not only serve delicious pastries & tea but also a variety of food including rice, noodles, snacks & coffee !

name: Penang Road Famous Teochew Chendul
description: A family-owned business that stood the test of time, we first started selling chendul at our humble stall located at Penang Road in 1936.

name: The FOUNDERS Hutton
description: MORE THAN JUST A CAFE by the original team from People & Places Café, led by #DADDY @SOONPORTER & Alexa Ooi (recipe developer).
